name: 6 Seconds Step
description:
You have to reach the goal within 1 minute. The catch is you are only allowed to move every 6 seconds. Can you make it just in time.

 6 Seconds Step is a game made for One Minute Jam. 
It was made within 24 hours period by JJWithNoSauce ;D

Controls :

  • Arrow Keys , WASD , Lclick , Rclick , Touch screen to move!

Rules :

  • You only get to move when the clock stops ticking.
  • The clock will stop ticking every 6 seconds.
  • Any attempts in moving when the clock's ticking will hurt you.
  • You have to reach the goal within 60 seconds.
  • You have two heart. Don't mess up.
  • I bet you can't beat the game hitless >:3

Thank you for playing! 
I really hope you enjoy this short little mini game I have made.
-JJWithNoSauce 2021
